name: Boots of Striding and Springing
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Wondrous Items/Boots of Striding and Springing

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, longstrider, creator must have 5 ranks in the Acrobatics skill

sections.body: These boots increase the wearer's base land speed by 10 feet. In addition to this striding ability (considered an enhancement bonus), these boots allow the wearer to make great leaps. She can jump with a +5 competence bonus on Acrobatics checks.
sections.name: Description
